name: Spoonz x Blocks
description:
== Download Spoonz x Blocks for free and play the brand-new, super-addictive, stage-based block-breaking game – even when offline ==

Destroy all the blocks with various splendid skills and collect Spoonz characters and their friends.
Spoonz x Blocks is completely free to play, but may have some optional in-app purchases.
Play with Facebook friends to see who has the highest score.
Travel through a variety of chapters, including the Factory, Jungle, Volcano, and more!


FEATURES
= Here’s a list of reasons why we can’t help falling in love with the cute game Spoonz x Blocks
● Journey through endless stages and chapters, including the Factory, Jungle, Desert, City, Volcano, Space, and more!
● Make use of the different special blocks available in each chapter
● Test yourself with challenge mode
● Collect adorably cute characters of varying levels from NORMAL, to UNIQUE, to LEGENDARY.
● Get numerous skills that help you explore and see more of the world

Have fun playing Spoonz x Blocks!
